name: Sweet Blast: Cookie Land
description:
Sweet Blast is a super fun & highly addictive match game that’ll keep you playing for hours!
Join Charlie on a colorful cookie land adventure bursting with a number of challenges!

HOW TO PLAY
• Tap on 2 or more cubes of the same color which are adjacent to each other.
• Special boosters & items to help you pass trickier levels.
• Pop all the Cubes with a minimal touch to score higher.
• No rush! There are no time limits.


FEATURES
• Numerous boosters and updates!
• NO WIFI? NO PROBLEM! Enjoy the puzzle game anytime, anywhere!

• TONS OF UNIQUE LEVELS
- Over 1000 levels with uniquely amazing challenges!
- Explore the delicious land with Charlie!

• EASY AND FUN PLAY
- Easy to learn and fun to master

• Daily Reward!
- Earn daily rewards to help you out!

• NO TIME LIMIT
- Play anytime, anywhere!

• NO WIFI? NO PROBLEM!
- Enjoy the game offline.

• STUNNING GRAPHICS
- Soothing soundtrack and gorgeous visual effects

NOTES
• Sweet Blast contains ads like video and house ads.
• Sweet Blast is free to play, but you can purchase in-app items like AD FREE and coins.

E-MAIL
• appcrm@puzzle1studio.com

HOMEPAGE
• https://www.puzzle1studio.com

Time to pop!
Thank you!
